name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Principal Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in the development and deployment of high-performance, scalable applications. Expert in **.NET 8**, **C#**, **Entity Framework Core**, and proficient in building **RESTful APIs** and **Microservices** aligned with **Event-driven architectures** and **Agile methodologies**. Proven track record of implementing CI/CD processes utilizing **Docker** and **Terraform** for **Infrastructure as Code**.

Experienced in leveraging **Azure App Services**, **Azure Functions**, **Azure Service Bus**, **Azure Storage**, and **Azure Key Vault** for cloud-native solutions, ensuring high availability and performance tuning with **SQL Server**. Adept in utilizing **Domain-Driven Design (DDD)** and implementing **CQRS patterns** to enhance system architecture.

Additionally, well-versed in building platforms involving advanced AI/ML capabilities, drawing from robust hands-on experience in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and mobile development using **Flutter**. Strong commitment to compliance-driven development with extensive knowledge of industry standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.
